content: need a companion to cuddle with on your big comfy couch molly is the perfect friend to snuggle up with read to and play with get ready to clown around pattern is fairly detailed for the crocheting but you will have to use your best judgement for sewing together if you need help please do not hesitate to message me use your smaller hook for all body parts and larger hook for all garments gauge note gauge is post-stuffing but is not critical **errata round 2 on both head and body should be chain 1 2 half_double_crochet in same st 2 *half_double_crochet* in each st around join in first st **
